level.heading: Termination of federal support; sense of the Congress relating to continuation of activities.
Termination of federal support
level.text: The authority under this subchapter to provide assistance to the private, nonprofit corporation or any other entity established pursuant to this subchapter shall terminate on October 1, 1999.

level.heading: Sense of the Congress relating to continuation of activities
level.text: It is the sense of the Congress that:
The activities of the private, nonprofit corporation under ยง 38-1806.04 should continue to be carried out after October 1, 1999, with resources made available from the private sector; and
The corporation should provide oversight and coordination for such activities after such date.
